results.name: a(n) = n*(5*n-3).
comment: Twice heptagonal numbers. - _Omar E. Pol_, May 14 2008
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
L. Hogben, Choice and Chance by Cardpack and Chessboard, Vol. 1, Max Parrish and Co, London, 1950, p. 36.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: Binomial transform of [2, 12, 10, 0, 0, 0,...]. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 05 2008
program: (Sage) [n*(5*n-3) for n in (0..50)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 05 2019
(GAP) List([0..50], n-> n*(5*n-3)) # _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 05 2019
xref: Cf. numbers of the form n*(n*k-k+4))/2 listed in A226488 (this sequence is the case k=10). - _Bruno Berselli_, Jun 10 2013
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 04 2008, Mar 05 2008
